'''A_SetSpriteRotation'''(float ''angle''[, int ''ptr''])
== Usage == Sets the rotation of the sprite without modifying the actor's angle property.
== Parameters == *''angle'' - The angle amount the sprite will be turned. Positive values turn it to the right, negative to the left. *''ptr'' - The [[Actor pointer]] to modify.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
